plot: Themes and ideas presented in the documentary, TEACH, by Davis Guggenheim, are discussed by Teachers from various School Districts around Southern California.
plot_en: Themes and ideas presented in the documentary, TEACH, by Davis Guggenheim, are discussed by Teachers from various School Districts around Southern California.
plot_es: Themes and ideas presented in the documentary, TEACH, by Davis Guggenheim, are discussed by Teachers from various School Districts around Southern California.
title: Teachers Talking About...
